Start: ^Innkeeper: Hey Mayor, a carpenter and his family have come to town.
^He doesn’t have any money but needs food and a place to stay.
^He says he can pay us back with free labor. Should we trust him?
Yes: ^You lose 10 food, get 3 citizens, and discount on next upgrade.
^+10 Food, +3 Citizens, -100 discount on next upgrade
No: ^You lose the chance for a discount.
